issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: a wrong number of the bytes read are copied into native buffer in hdfsRead()

comments.body: I know {{readDirect()}} is used most of the time, but i think it's really a minor bug. In hadoop-1.2.1, which has no direct read support, the bug does not exist.
